metadata.description: Ratings first. Transparency always shown. No hidden advertisements.

developers.title: Developer Rankings
developers.subtitle: Evaluating and ranking real estate developers based on reputation, project quality, and track record.

methodology.title: Ranking Methodology
methodology.description: Developers are ranked based on multiple criteria: number of completed projects, delivery quality, brand reputation, financial health, and customer feedback. Rankings are updated periodically as new information becomes available.

verified.label: Verified
verified.description: Project has been fully verified by RealTera from reliable sources. Rating and scores accurately reflect current status.

pending.label: Under Review
pending.description: Project is being verified. Some information may not be fully confirmed. Rating may change after verification.

notVerified.label: Not Verified
notVerified.description: Project has not been verified by RealTera. Information shown is based on public data, please use with caution.

notRated.label: Not Rated
notRated.description: Project does not have enough information for evaluation. May be new or have anomalies requiring investigation.

qualityOfLife.greenSpaceTooltip: Green Space Ratio: {ratio}% of the area is parks, gardens, and greenery. Higher = better living environment

about.title: About RealTera
about.subtitle: Vietnam's first transparent real estate rating platform
about.missionText: Help home buyers make informed decisions based on transparent, objective, and easy-to-understand information.
about.whyExistIntro: Vietnam's real estate market lacks a reliable source of information. Home buyers often face:
about.whyExistConclusion: RealTera was created to solve these problems, providing an independent and objective perspective on real estate projects.
about.transparentDesc: All evaluation criteria and information sources are publicly disclosed
about.objectiveDesc: Evaluations based on data, not influenced by commercial interests
about.easyToUnderstandDesc: Simple rating system for quick and accurate comparisons
about.disclaimerText: Information on RealTera is for reference only, not professional investment advice. Users should do their own research and consult experts before making home purchase decisions.

methodology.title: Rating Methodology
methodology.subtitle: Understand how RealTera evaluates and ranks real estate projects
methodology.philosophyText: RealTera believes that transparent information is every home buyer's right. We build our rating system based on objective data, not influenced by advertising or commercial interests.
methodology.criteriaIntro: Each project is evaluated based on 5 main criteria, with a total score of 100:
methodology.valueDesc: Selling price vs actual value, appreciation potential
methodology.tierTableIntro: Based on total score, each project is placed in one of 8 tiers:
methodology.dataSourcesIntro: Evaluation information is compiled from multiple reliable sources:
methodology.source3: Actual transaction data from real estate platforms
methodology.source4: Feedback from residents and existing buyers
methodology.updateFrequencyText: Project information is updated weekly and immediately when significant changes occur (legal, progress, incidents). Each update is recorded in the project's change history.

calculator.title: Rent or Buy?
calculator.subtitle: Analyze real costs, investment opportunities, and break-even point to make smart financial decisions
calculator.loanTermHelp: Maximum loan term is usually 25-35 years
calculator.investmentReturnHelp: If not buying, you could invest in stocks, funds, etc. Average S&P 500 return: 10%/year
calculator.analysisPeriodHelp: How long do you plan to stay?
calculator.disclaimerText: This is an estimation tool based on simplified assumptions. Please consult a financial expert before making major decisions.
calculator.exceedsAffordabilityDesc: Mortgage takes {ratio} of income (max recommended: 40%). Affordable price for your income:
calculator.pmtDesc: Monthly payment is calculated using the PMT formula:
calculator.priceToRentDesc: Years of rent to equal purchase price. Lower ratio = buy, higher = rent.
calculator.futureValueDesc: Asset value after N years with growth rate G%:
calculator.breakEvenDesc: Year when buying becomes more profitable than renting + investing:
calculator.breakEvenWhen: Break-even occurs when: Buy position > Rent position
calculator.ifStayLess: If you plan to stay less than {years} years, renting is better.
calculator.dtiDesc: Percentage of income used for debt. Lower is safer.

reasons.dtiExceeds: DTI ratio ({ratio}) exceeds safe threshold of 40%. Need to increase income or reduce target price.
reasons.priceToRentHigh: Price/rent ratio ({ratio}x) is too high. Property price is unreasonable compared to market rent.
reasons.buyBetterShort: Buying is better by {amount} after {years} years, with break-even at only {breakEven} years.
reasons.buyBetterLong: Buying is better, but takes {breakEven} years to break even. Suitable if you plan to stay long-term.
reasons.rentBetterBy: Renting + investing will be better by {amount} after {years} years.

governance.title: Rating Governance
governance.subtitle: Our commitment to transparent, auditable, and conflict-free real estate ratings

ratingsFirst.title: Ratings First. Transparency Always.
ratingsFirst.description: Our ratings are derived from evidence and attestations, not commercial relationships. Every score is reproducible, auditable, and explainable.

noInvestmentPromises.title: No Investment Promises
noInvestmentPromises.description: We do not include ROI or investment value in our scoring. Investment analysis tools are provided separately with explicit disclaimers and user-input assumptions.

commercialIsolation.title: Commercial Isolation
commercialIsolation.description: Sponsored placements, awards, and lead services are technically and operationally isolated from our rating system. They cannot influence scores by design.

scoringMethodology.title: Scoring Methodology
scoringMethodology.description: Projects are evaluated on 4 objective criteria. Each criterion is weighted based on its importance to buyer safety and project quality.

roiRemoved.title: ROI/Investment Value Removed
roiRemoved.description: Investment value scoring has been removed to comply with Vietnam's Advertising Law (effective January 1, 2026) and avoid investment-promise liability. Investment analysis is available in our calculator tools with explicit disclaimers.

dataIsolation.title: Data Isolation
dataIsolation.description: Commercial data (sponsored placements, awards, leads) is stored in a separate database schema with no foreign key relationships to rating data. Our rating computation system has no database-level access to commercial tables.

noRankingInfluence.title: No Ranking Influence
noRankingInfluence.description: Sponsored status does not affect sort order. Projects are ranked purely by tier and score. Sponsored badges are displayed for transparency, not priority.

disclosureRequirements.title: Disclosure Requirements
disclosureRequirements.description: All sponsored content is clearly labeled with disclosure tooltips explaining the nature of the commercial relationship.

awardsTransparency.title: Awards Transparency
awardsTransparency.description: Award nominations involve fees and are clearly labeled as a paid marketing program. Awards do not influence project ratings.

auditTrail.title: Audit Trail
auditTrail.description: Every rating change is recorded with full traceability.

scoreRunRecords.title: Score Run Records
scoreRunRecords.description: Every score calculation creates an immutable record with inputs hash, evidence links, and methodology version.

evidenceMapping.title: Evidence Mapping
evidenceMapping.description: Each sub-score is linked to specific evidence items and attestations that support or refute the rating.

scoreDiffs.title: Score Diffs
scoreDiffs.description: When ratings change, a diff record explains what changed and why, with component-level deltas.

onChainAnchoring.title: On-Chain Anchoring
onChainAnchoring.description: Score run hashes can be anchored to Mantle blockchain for tamper-evident proof of rating history.

issuerVerification.title: Issuer Verification
issuerVerification.description: Attestations that contribute to ratings are issued by verified entities with scoped authority.

issuerRegistry.title: Issuer Registry
issuerRegistry.description: All issuers must be registered with verified credentials before they can sign attestations. Credentials include business licenses, professional certifications, and regulatory approvals.

scopedAuthority.title: Scoped Authority
scopedAuthority.description: Each issuer is authorized for specific attestation types (e.g., legal status, construction progress). They cannot sign attestations outside their scope.

dualControl.title: Dual Control
dualControl.description: High-impact attestations require dual control: one member signs, another reviews and publishes.

disputeProcess.title: Dispute Process
disputeProcess.description: If you believe a rating is inaccurate, you can submit a dispute with supporting evidence.
steps: Submit dispute via the project page or contact form
Provide supporting evidence (documents, photos, official records)
Our team reviews within 5 business days
If valid, the rating is updated with a public diff explanation
If rejected, you receive a detailed explanation

daily.label: Daily
daily.description: New evidence and attestations are processed and reflected in scores.

weekly.label: Weekly
weekly.description: Full re-scoring of all projects with stale evidence (older than 30 days).

quarterly.label: Quarterly
quarterly.description: Methodology review and potential weight adjustments (with public announcement).

verify.title: Verify Attestation
verify.subtitle: Check the verification status of real estate projects on Mantle blockchain
verify.searchPlaceholder: Enter project slug or asset ID (0x...)
verify.notFoundError: No verification found for this ID

tier1_2.title: Tier 1-2: Basic
tier1_2.description: Check basic legal documents and consistency of project files.

tier3.title: Tier 3: Confirmed
tier3.description: Cross-reference with land registry, with independent co-signatory verification.

tier4.title: Tier 4: Monitored
tier4.description: Continuous monitoring, periodic updates, and alerts on changes.
